transcript:
Customer: Yes good evening sir Shiva baat kar raha tha India Mart se kaise ho aap?
Executive: Main theek hu sir Shiva bhai mere ko complaint raise karana hai ek.
Customer: Haan wo actually abhi Ashutosh ji ne mujhe bataya hai.
Executive: To aap mujhe sari detail share kar dijiye mobile number theek hai. Aapne pura ka pura detail mujhe whatsapp kar dijiye. Shiva bhai tumko meri baat suno pehle kya hota tha na man lo hum kisi
Customer: party ka kuch hum jara karte nahi the fir bhi agar man lo humne kisi party ko thoda sa mal late kar diya uska mal nahi mila to wo hume fraud samajh ke hamari complaint karta hai pe koi bhi party ki baat kar raha hu bahar ki baat kar raha hu main to hamara account freeze ho jata tha aapki taraf se.
Executive: Hota tha yaad hai aapko pata hai. To mere ko iska account freeze chahiye isme mere 4 lakh rupaye fas gaye bhai.
Customer: 35 lakh rupaye.
Executive: To aap mujhe sari detail bhej dijiye. Main aapko kya kya bheju ye batao mere ko sabse pehle bhej raha hu mere ko iska party ka screenshot aapko konsi company hai ye.
Customer: Sure aur invoice vagera. Company ki bheji maine ye invoice sab bheju sir sab bhejuunga invoice bhej raha hu chat bhej raha hu jo isne bola tha ki aapke mal post milte hi payment kar denge aapki. Inhone mere ko bola ki mal aap pahucha do mal post jaise mal aayega mal aane ke baad aapki hum payment karenge 50% payment karenge mal aane ke do din baad maine theek hai main uske baad ye bolte hai mere ko ki mal aane ke 15 din baad baki ki payment aapki perfect ho jayegi ab mal poche 15 din ho chuke hai to mere ko bolte hai kuch payment nahi kari ab tak mere ko aur bolte hai ki bhai mal pahunchne ke ab 15 din ho chuke hai 15 din aur mang rahe hai mere se aur keh rahe hai jaise jaise hamara mal amazon pe aage bikega fir amazon india pe bikega waise waise hum payment karenge. Jabki ye baat hui nahi thi ab ek baat to batao yaar unka mal agar 10 din nahi bika 20 din nahi bika ek mahine nahi bika main ruk rahunga payment ke liye apni bhai maine mal diya meri quotation ke andar likha hua hai ki 50% advance 50% mal milne ke baad fir bhi saal ke andar likhi hui hai har ki padne ke baad bhi unki mere pass chat hai har ek cheez hai main aapko sab bhej raha hu.
Executive: Koi nahi aap mujhe payment hogi in logo se. Haan mujhe aap detail share kar dijiye main usko check kara leta hu.
Customer: Main abhi kar raha hu Shiva sir aapko. Sure sure aap bhej dijiye mujhe aur sab bhej dijiyega.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to raise a complaint.

- Account freeze due to non-payment.

- Payment not received after 15 days.



Resolution:

- Asked to share all details via WhatsApp.

- Assured to check the details.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, refund, payment, account freeze
